name: Matamoros Style Seafood Stew
description: This vegan Matamoros style seafood stew is a spicy, tangy, and hearty stew of oyster mushrooms, chickpeas, hearts of palm, and corn simmered in a chile-tomato broth. It is served with chopped cilantro, a splash of lime juice, and tostadas.
recipeIngredient: 8  Dried guajillo chiles, (soaked, seeded and chopped)
14 ounces Hearts of palm, (half diced in rings, half julienned)
4 ears Fresh corn on the cob (broken into halves)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large soup pot, and sauté the garlic, oregano, salt, pepper, cumin, ancho chile powder, chipotle powder, and dulse flakes for 3 minutes. Add the rehydrated guajillo chiles, tomatoes, and tomato sauce. Lower the heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large soup pot, and sauté the garlic, oregano, salt, pepper, cumin, ancho chile powder, chipotle powder, and dulse flakes for 3 minutes. Add the rehydrated guajillo chiles, tomatoes, and tomato sauce. Lower the heat and simmer for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Purée the mix (the soup base) with an immersion blender (or in batches with a conventional blender). Transfer the soup base to a bowl and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Purée the mix (the soup base) with an immersion blender (or in batches with a conventional blender). Transfer the soup base to a bowl and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In the same pot, heat 1 tablespoon of oil on medium heat and sauté the carrots, onions, celery and mushrooms for 4 minutes. Return the soup base to the pot. Add the vegetable stock, and cook for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In the same pot, heat 1 tablespoon of oil on medium heat and sauté the carrots, onions, celery and mushrooms for 4 minutes. Return the soup base to the pot. Add the vegetable stock, and cook for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the hearts of palm, corn on the cob and chickpeas. Cook for 5 to 7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the hearts of palm, corn on the cob and chickpeas. Cook for 5 to 7 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot, garnished with cilantro and lime wedges.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot, garnished with cilantro and lime wedges.
